entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain or snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
